This is a very good game but do not waste your time playing comp matchmaking.  It is full of closet wall hackers that has taken over the game.  If you want to enjoy the full aspect of this game, play it on face it or ESEA.

I am very very good, I just need to work on communication, aim, map awareness, crosshair placement, economy management, pistol aim, awp flicks, grenade spots, smoke spots, pop flashes, positioning, bomb plant positions, retake ability, bunny hopping, spray control and getting kills. Then, I'll be the next young talent. *Thx Stolen*
